sentences.sContent: A Thai architect took his love for elephants and designed a luxury residence and office building in the shape of a pachyderm.
sentences.sContent_eng: A Thai architect took his love for elephants and designed a luxury residence and office building in the shape of a pachyderm.
sentences.sCn: 一个泰国建筑师将其对大象的热爱兑现于以此厚皮类动物设计了这个住宅办公综合楼。

synos.tran: 迟钝的人；厚脸皮的人；[脊椎]厚皮类动物

trans.tranCn: 厚皮类动物, 迟钝的人
trans.tranOther: an animal with thick skin, such as an  elephant
